__e: But it doesn't give you the right to treat your coworkers as a horse shit, Janice.
If they both turn up at the shop and deliver the goods, why would someone threaten them and kill them after the event, after they'd finished the job?
They have no right threatening me, beating me up.
Threaten me again and I will end you, general.
Threaten me like you have the American people for so long.
You tell me I have something you want and then you threaten my friends.
